oi it's always been a challenge to

because that's his territory but we
couldn't find anyone to watch him we
became very stressed and almost didn't
go to Myanmar until I came across a
website called trusted house sitters in
a nutshell it's a pet loving community
for owners and sitters who help each
other travel by exchanging pet-sitting
for a free place to stay so I met a
profile posted about our trip and
quickly received a message from Vanessa
I applied because I wanted to make a new

this service for years and it has
literally changed her life as she works

just have
